main event: Two bright silver objects were reported sighted at Carswell AFB, Texas on March 19, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting involved two round-shaped objects that appeared side-by-side for several minutes., Neither object emitted any sound during the observation., One object disappeared straight up while the second object went southward., The objects were described as having a shape similar to a nickel and were bright silver in color., An observer's reliability was questioned due to previous head injury; his account was not considered reliable.
witness description: John G. Niber, SSGT 7BW FIELD MAINTENANCE
